turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Sofia. I would like to have Starbucks coffee . Could you please assist me with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I am happy to help , Ms. Kate.Where are you going to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The usual 222 Broadway , New York .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I use your credit card ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No , please. Log in into my account , I believe I have a reward for a free drink .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what are you having today ? Regular dark roast ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am craving for a good Late .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please , and make it Grande .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sugar or other flavor would you like in your Late?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh , no. I love my coffee strong and without any flavors .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Placing the order now , it should be ready by 12:20pm. Is there anything else you would like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. Almost forgot , make sure they use Almond milk or lactose free .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I did , all set . Enjoy your drink .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: By the way , sorry I didn't think of it before . Feel free to order some food and any drink on me .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you so much . I don't really know what to have there for food .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Try spinach , egg white and feta wrap. My favorite . Please do enjoy it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you again , I will try this one .

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for help. Have a nice day .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome . See you later .
